tool.name: Summary.qual
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='summary.qual' --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.summary$:'$out_summary --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' --qfile="$qfile" #if $name.__str__ != "None" and len($name.__str__) > 0: --name="$name" #end if ## --processors=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-8} #if $count.__str__ != "None" and len($count.__str__) > 0: --count="$count" #end if
tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The summary.qual_ command reads a quality file and an optional name, and summarizes the quality information.
.. _summary.qual: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Summary.qual
